attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the Prime Minister to stop the sales of housing to foreignors and give the opportunity to the Native British (English) to have the opportunity to own their housing on their native soil.
It is not fair to have foreignors, who despite their plea of poverty, they often have foreign Banks hiding their real wealth.
The government should protect the English man first, and above all other.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
